text: @CSIS #Ukraine #WarInUkraine #Russia #InternationalSecurityTwo years have passed since Russia's invasion of Ukraine, and the war rages on. Join us for a virtual discussion with experts from CSIS to get an update on the state of the conflict and what the future holds for Ukrainian and Russian strategy. Don't miss this opportunity to hear from Seth G. Jones, Eliot A. Cohen, Emily Harding, and the Honorable Michael Vickers as they share their insights on the war in Ukraine. #Ukraine #WarInUkraine #Russia #InternationalSecurityJoin the conversation and get the latest updates on this critical issue. The future of U.S. and Western aid to Ukraine hangs in the balance, and we need your voice to be heard! Tune in now and make your voice count!
